snippet: This increasingly brutal conflict could and should have ended long ago, but Russian leaders have continued to stoke the flames.
abstract: Editorial contends Ukrainian conflict has gone on too long, in light of casualties on the ground, major escalation of American sanctions against Russia, and the shooting down of military plane and Malaysia Airlines jetliner; urges Pres Vladimir V Putin to stop conflict by telling Russian-backed separatists to end their insurgency and stopping flow of money and heavy weaponry to those groups.
lead_paragraph: This increasingly brutal conflict could and should have ended long ago, but Russian leaders have continued to stoke the flames.

headline.seo: Downing of Malaysia Jet Is a Call to End Ukraine Conflict
headline.main: Vladimir Putin Can Stop This War
headline.print_headline: Vladimir Putin Can Stop This War
